text.title: Fiat Chrysler recalls 7,810 Jeep SUVs for software vulnerability
text.head: Fiat Chrysler recalls 7,810 Jeep SUVs for software vulnerability
Sources

list.item: Reuters. "Fiat Chrysler U.S. to recall 7,810 SUVs to prevent hacking" — Yahoo! Finance , September 4, 2015
Katie Bo Williams. "Fiat Chrysler recalls over 7,000 hackable vehicles" — The Hill (newspaper) , September 4, 2015
